games.title: Treasure Hunt
games.description: Navigate a grid to find the hidden treasure using Cubit code. Practice loops, conditionals, and logic.
games.instructions: Write Cubit code to move your player (P) to the treasure (T) on a 5x5 grid. Use commands like move_up(), move_down(), move_left(), move_right().

games.title: Code Race
games.description: Race to the finish line by solving Cubit puzzles quickly. Compete against a timer or AI.
games.instructions: Complete each Cubit challenge as fast as possible. Each correct solution moves your racer forward.

games.title: Animated Art
games.description: Create generative art with Cubit code. See your code come to life with colors and shapes.
games.instructions: Use Cubit to draw shapes, patterns, or animations. Try: draw_circle(x, y, r), set_color('red'), animate().

games.title: STEM Project: Solar System
games.description: Model the solar system with Cubit. Animate planets orbiting the sun.
games.instructions: Use Cubit to create and animate planets. Try: create_planet('Earth', 100, 'blue'), orbit('Earth', 'Sun', 365).

games.title: Graphing Calculator
games.description: Plot mathematical functions and data with Cubit code.
games.instructions: Use plot(x, y) to graph points or functions. Try: plot([1,2,3], [1,4,9]) for y = x^2.
games.starter:
let x = [1,2,3]
let y = [1,4,9]
plot(x, y)
games.solution:
let x = [1,2,3]
let y = [1,4,9]
plot(x, y)
